message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a generous offer of $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm hoping you'll take advantage of it.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1050000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $1050000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering a new price of $1250000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value and your willingness to negotiate.
